fadeless.midnightconfig.chatFade.tooltip:
Toggles the fade out of the chat box. 

§lDefault §a§lEnabled
fadeless.midnightconfig.customChatFadeTi:
This controls how long it takes for the chat to fade out. 
20 Ticks = 1 second 

§lDefault 200

§lDefault §c§lDisabled

fadeless.midnightconfig.titlescreenfadet:
